headline.main: GERMANS REPORT VICTORY IN SOUTH; Three Russian Divisions Said to Have Been Destroyed in Drive Toward Donets

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept, 29 -- German forces driving toward the Donets Basin and Kharkov, in the Eastern Ukraine, have beaten back strong Soviet counter-attacks and destroyed three Red Army divisions in a new battle of encirclement, the German High Command announced today.
abstract: Germans rept 3 USSR divs destroyed, Donets Basin area; Ital troops reptd aiding drive; prisoners estimated; Moscow raid reptd; Finns bomb Murmansk rr
